Action.name: install-mossaic
Action.command: export VERSION=0.4.2 && installed_version=`cat /opt/mossaic/lib/python2.7/site-packages/mossaic/version.py || echo "not_installed" | cut -d '"' -f 2` && [ $VERSION != $installed_version ] && export RELEASE=mossaic-$VERSION && mkdir -p /opt/mossaic/staging && curl -o /opt/mossaic/staging/$RELEASE.tar.gz http://vm-37-00.dice.cluster/tarballs/$RELEASE.tar.gz && cd /opt/mossaic/staging && tar xvfz $RELEASE.tar.gz && cd /opt/mossaic/staging/$RELEASE && echo "" | ./configure -p /opt/mossaic -v vo.landslides.mossaic.org -s UoB-Hep-Development -u dips://chevner.phy.bris.ac.uk:9135/Configuration/Server -a michael.wallace@bristol.ac.uk && make lite && chown -R mossaic:mossaic /opt/mossaic

Action.name: create-mossaic-user
Action.command: groupadd mossaic && useradd -c "mossaic system user" -d /opt/mossaic -g mossaic mossaic
